item.title: Which logo do you prefer?
item.dc:creator: Xavier Damman
item.content:encoded:
I have this new idea that I'm very excited about. I can't tell very much right now but I will share 3 things with you:
  • It will be called "LISTITI".
  • It's a new service dedicated to improve Twitter (Is this really a surprise?)
  • It will launch very soon (before 15th November). So stay tunned.
Before launching it, I would love to hear your feedback on the logo. Please take the poll and help me choose between the 3 logos for Listiti.com
